/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on developing claims based on participation in Project SHAD, including
researching SHAD in the Individual Longitudinal Exposure Record (ILER)
procedures for researching SHAD participation
, and
requesting TERA medical opinions for SHAD participants
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 6, Section A - Developing Claims Based on Participation in Project Shipboard Hazard and Defense (SHAD)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 6, Section A
